content: this corner-to-corner dishcloth is a great quick project for a beginner knitter as it teaches you how to knit garter stitch how to increase through yarn overs and how to decrease plus it s a great stash buster so you can use up those leftover cotton yarns in your yarn stash all you need is 100% cotton worsted-weight or dk cotton yarn and us 6 4 mm knitting needles
